name: Beat Island
description:
Made for Mini Jam 108: Seaside!

A furious storm crashed upon your boat. In hopes to please the gods your team threw overboard a man as a sacrifice. Little you knew that the old fella was an oracle sent by gods to preach and seed fruits of wisdom. A desert island nearby is your only chance for salvation. Save as many people as you can to return good favour of heavnly deities. But beware of their wrath!

Controls:

W to turn the island clockwise
S to turn the island counterclockwise
Avoid waves, forest fires, lightnings and volcano eruptions and stick to the rythm!

Made by:

makkmygat - Unity development, programming
Farkprice - 3D-modeling, music
Fifth Invader - Game design
